1.title: Training Faye
1.plot: Julie gets frustrated when the family use Chloe's birthday as a reason to compete against each other. And, Nanny Faye gets more than she bargained for when Todd insists on being her trainer.

2.title: Todd and Pony Show
2.plot: Todd becomes Faye's assistant after finding out that she's been making Julie to run all of her errands. Meanwhile, Savannah gets over-excited when Chloe shows an interest in horseback riding.

3.title: A Date with Destiny
3.plot: A newly single Chase gets caught off guard when his family sets him up on a double blind date. Meanwhile, Todd struggles with how to handle Grayson's latest homework assignment.

4.title: Biddy Battle
4.plot: Todd finds himself in the middle of an old biddy battle when Frances moves in with Faye. And Grayson attempts to break a world record.

5.title: Painted into a Corner
5.plot: Todd stresses out Julie when he insists on investing in an oil painting of the family. And after a kitchen fire, Grayson decides the Chrisleys need some emergency response training.

6.title: Hearts and Craft
6.plot: Chase rescues Faye when Todd demands on chaperoning her to a Senior Dance. Meanwhile, Todd struggles to come up with a Valentines gift for Julie when she suggests something handmade.

7.title: Top Dog
7.plot: Todd's opinion embarrasses Julie when she offers to organize a children's art fair. Meanwhile, the race is on for top dog when Faye and Grayson enter their pups into a pageant.

8.title: Celebrating a Chrisley Century
8.plot: To celebrate 100 episodes of Chrisley Knows Best, the family takes a look back on all the greatest, most meaningful and overly ridiculous moments from the show.

9.title: Panic at the Pageant
9.plot: Todd takes on too much as the family heads to Florida to run their first Miss Florida USA pageant. And when Faye makes a rash purchase, Todd insists on calling her out.

10.title: No Men for Old Country
10.plot: This week, Todd and Jay struggle to prove their manliness in Chrisley Knows Best episode 610, "No Men for Old Country."

11.title: Baking Up is Hard to Do
11.plot: Todd attempts to be supportive when Julie prepares desserts for a restaurant Grand Opening. Meanwhile, Chase tries to get back in Savannah's good graces as she deals with insecurities.

12.title: Running Gout of Time
12.plot: Julie questions her decision to let Chase help her and Allison train for a 5K. And when Todd is diagnosed with gout, he struggles to understand why his family has no sympathy.

13.title: Ride or Die
13.plot: When Julie's stress reaches a breaking point, Todd comes up with a plan to alleviate it. Chase helps Nanny learn to ride a bike.

14.title: Going for Broker
14.plot: After Todd signs a development deal, he fuels a competition between Julie, Chase and Savannah to be the listing agent. Meanwhile, Grayson decides to help Todd get over his fear of snakes.

15.title: America's Next Todd Model
15.plot: Faye takes the law in to her own hands when the neighborhood kids annoy her. And Todd gets a second shot at becoming a male model.

16.title: Say It, Don't Spray It
16.plot: Todd clashes with Chase when he finds out Chase got back together with his ex-girlfriend. And Savannah tests out her spray tanning skills on Nanny Faye.

17.title: Emotionally In-Vested
17.plot: When Nanny frets about leaving Miley behind to go out of town Chase comes up with an idea to help out. Todd lands himself in trouble on a date with Julie.

18.title: White Nannies Can't Jump
18.plot: Todd and Julie's podcasting career almost ends before it starts when Todd goes overboard with preparation. Meanwhile, Nanny Faye joins a senior basketball league.

19.title: Restaurant Impossible
19.plot: Julie finds that her vision of opening up her own restaurant clashes with Todd's vision.

20.title: Spoiled Sports
20.plot: Todd gets roped into a boys trip to Universal Orlando for Grayson's birthday.

21.title: The Perfect Equation
21.plot: When Savannah brings home her new boyfriend Todd takes the opportunity to test his intentions

22.title: Lord of the Earrings
22.plot: Nanny Faye enlists Chase's help with the hopes of winning a neighborhood porch competition

23.title: Diplomatic Immunity
23.plot: Due to a work commitment, Julie must miss Chloe's Pre-K graduation and Todd takes over her duties.

24.title: Towing the Line
24.plot: Chase takes advantage of his dad's car when Savannah signs them up to babysit over Father's Day.

1.title: Patriarch of Perfection
1.plot: Meet the Chrisley family, where Todd Chrisley is king. He micromanages his family just like his business and always tries to stay five steps ahead of his 5 children.

2.title: Not So Sweet Sixteen
2.plot: Savannah is turning sweet 16, and a big birthday bash is in the works. Todd has to come to grips with the fact that his little girl is growing into a young woman.

3.title: Jugs and Ammo
3.plot: While Lindsie recovers from plastic surgery, Todd and Lindsie's husband, Will, make an effort to find some common ground at the most unexpected place - a shooting range.

4.title: Two Men and a Baby
4.plot: The Chrisleys welcome Kyle's daughter, Baby Chloe, who is coming to live with Todd and Julie while they teach Kyle "Parenting 101." Meanwhile, Savannah and Chase get into a fender bender.

5.title: Todd-tervention
5.plot: Todd takes Savannah and Chase to New York City to teach them more about the fashion business. Savannah is a perfect student, but Chase is only interested in the models and the nightlife.

6.title: Big Apple Blowup
6.plot: When an influential Southern magazine asks The Chrisleys for an interview about all things fashion, Todd insists on controlling the situation by writing a script for his family to memorize.

7.title: Date Night
7.plot: The Chrisley children treat Todd and Julie to a day of pampering and a romantic dinner. Unfortunately, Todd is in the middle of a business transaction that is taking up all his attention.

8.title: Hey Chloe, It's Your Birthday
8.plot: Todd bets Julie that he can throw just as fabulous of a birthday party for Chloe as she could. Julie agrees to the bet, but tells Todd that he has to do it all on his own.

1.title: Rules for Dating My Teenage Daughter
1.plot: When Julie decides to return to work, Todd must pick up the slack at home; Savannah wants to start dating a 19 year old musician.

2.title: Misadventures in Babysitting
2.plot: Todd and Julie leave Grayson in the care of Chase and Savannah when they go out of town for the night; Chase and Savannah have their own plans.

3.title: Father's Day
3.plot: The Chrisley's children want to plan the perfect day for Todd for Father's Day, but Todd's competitive nature threatens the fun.

4.title: Confessions of a Beauty Queen
4.plot: Todd and Julie decide it is time to downsize their house; the family is driven crazy by Todd's controlling ways; Savannah prepares for a Pageant.

5.title: Chase Turns 18
5.plot: When Chase celebrates his 18th birthday, and declares he will not follow house rules anymore, Todd shows him what it is like to be an adult.

6.title: Anger Management
6.plot: Todd learns that he has high blood pressure, and blames his family for the ailment; Todd must find a way to relieve stress.

7.title: California Chrisleys
7.plot: The family travels to Los Angeles for what Todd hopes is a relaxing family vacation; Savannah does something drastic; Faye disappears.

8.title: Workin' for a Living
8.plot: After paying for their extravagant launch, Todd wants Savannah and Chase to get summer jobs to learn the value of money.

9.title: The Great Outdoors
9.plot: Todd, Chase and Grayson go camping in a luxury RV; Savannah and Julie relearn the basics at driving school.

10.title: Marriage Redux
10.plot: Todd and Julie want to avoid a marriage rut when the kids go to college, so they look for new ways to reconnect and put the spark back in their relationship. Todd and Julie want to avoid a marriage rut when the kids go to college, so they look for new ways to reconnect and put the spark back in their relationship. Todd and Julie want to avoid a marriage rut when the kids go to college, so they look for new ways to reconnect and put the spark back in their relationship.

11.title: Houseguest from Hell
11.plot: When Julie's demanding pregnant friend visits, Todd's home life is disrupted; Todd reaches out to Lindsie

12.title: Still Chrisley After All These Years
12.plot: Julie and Todd throw a charity event for breast cancer to celebrate their wedding anniversary; after a mix-up everyone must scramble.

13.title: A Very Chrisley Christmas
13.plot: Following last season's hit special, "A Very Chrisley Christmas," viewers will get another holiday delight as the Chrisley family welcomes you into their impeccably decorated winter wonderland home and prepares for Julie's delicious Christmas dinner. Over the course of the episode, they will reminisce over their favorite moments from the season, reliving their comical interactions and mishaps through a compilation of prior and never-before-seen clips.

1.title: Savannah's Big Id-ea
1.plot: The Chrisley's are interviewed for a magazine and Todd writes a script for his family to memorize; when things go off script, Todd retaliates with some honesty.

2.title: Life's a Pitch
2.plot: Todd tries to help out and coach Grayson's baseball team but discovers he's in over his head and struggles to gain control of overzealous nine year olds.

3.title: Getting Testy
3.plot: When Savannah wants to go to college a year early, Todd wages a family competition to keep her home as long as possible; Chase pays the price when Todd is his ACT coach.

4.title: My Chrisley Valentine
4.plot: Todd recruits Savannah to help teach Chase a lesson after learning he is dating several different girls on Valentine's Day; Chase is left the victim of a Catfish prank only Todd Chrisley could dream up.

5.title: Dollars and Sense
5.plot: Todd puts Savannah on a realistic budget to help prepare her for the real world, but when she is fired from two jobs she must dig deep to make her money back.

6.title: Chrisley's on Campus
6.plot: A road trip to Nashville to tour a college campus; Todd is excited for family bonding time, but Savannah has plans of her own.

7.title: Nurse Todd
7.plot: Todd's feelings are hurt when no one needs his help, until Savannah gets appendicitis; Savannah decides to milk it and becomes the patient from hell.

8.title: College Bootcamp
8.plot: When Chase pays a stranger to change his flat tire, Todd and Julie realize that they have sheltered their kids and decide to put them through a rigorous real-life boot camp.

9.title: Rules of Engagement
9.plot: When Todd learns that Savannah is keeping her new boyfriend from the family, he goes to extreme lengths to get a glimpse of the new guy.

10.title: Failure to Launch
10.plot: Julie is eager to start a food blog, but when no one likes her page, she and Todd go on a food journey.

11.title: Mid-Life Chrisley
11.plot: With Todd's birthday fast approaching, he begins to obsess about his age and reject getting older, but with the help of Mama Faye and her friends, he begins to accept the future.

12.title: Dude Ranch
12.plot: The Chrisley family stays at a Dude Ranch for Grayson's birthday.

13.title: Chrisley's Take London
13.plot: Chase and Savannah are excited to travel to London, however Todd does not share the sentiment; the family tries to break free of Todd's control.

14.title: Lord Chrisley
14.plot: When Todd takes his family to the English countryside, he insists on turning the Chrisleys into a proper English family but when the family resists, Todd goes to great lengths to prove he's a royal.

15.title: Love and Marriage
15.plot: Todd and Julie prepare to make an anniversary video, but when cracks in the marriage appear, they set out to reinvent themselves.

16.title: Sports Day
16.plot: Every summer the Chrisleys attend a family friend's annual Sports Day BBQ, and every year they are put to shame. Determined to break their losing streak, Todd's competitive spirit pushes his family to their breaking points.

17.title: Hometown Hero
17.plot: The Chrisleys head to their South Carolina lake house, which also happens to be in the town where Todd grew up. Todd decides the kids are in need of a family history lesson -but when Todd reunites with some of his childhood friends, the lesson turns out to be more than he bargained for, and the Chrisley kids learn some useful dirt on their dad.

18.title: The Graduates
18.plot: Chase and Savannah have just graduated high school and a celebration is already in the works. As spirits run high, Todd plans on surprising Savannah by inviting her boyfriend Blaire to perform; there's just one problem, Savannah has decided to take a break from Blaire which inadvertently threatens Todd's big plans.

19.title: A Very Chrisley Christmas 2
19.plot: The Chrisley family welcomes viewers into their home while they reminisce about their favorite moments of the season.

20.title: Leaving the Nest
20.plot: Todd drops Savannah off at college in Nashville, but in typical Todd fashion, finds a way to keep tabs on her. Meanwhile, Chase has his own scheme to capitalize on Savannah's new home.

1.title: Crowning Achievements
1.plot: Disappointed that he missed Savannah being crowned Miss Tennessee Teen USA, Todd plans a party to celebrate. Tension builds when it becomes clear the party is more for Todd than Savannah.

2.title: The Wrath of Todd
2.plot: When Chase asserts his independence by getting a tattoo of a Bible verse, Todd tries everything in his power to entice Chase to remove it. Meanwhile, Savannah is failing her college Bible class.

3.title: Todd Unleashed
3.plot: When Savannah returns home for Jackson۪s third birthday, she brings her new puppy with her, infuriating Todd. Chase attempts to bond with his dad for his own financial gain.

4.title: Lights, Camera, Chase
4.plot: When Chase scores an internship at a local television station, he is forced to deal with some difficult talent, Todd Chrisley. And, looking for a new hobby, Faye and Julie learn Italian.

5.title: Runaway Faye
5.plot: Todd discovers that Faye has injured her foot on yet another gambling adventure and insists she recover at his house.

6.title: Moving On
6.plot: In an effort to cheer up Grayson, Savannah organizes a farewell weekend for Grayson and friends.

8.title: Smoothie Operator
8.plot: The family prepares for the Grand Opening of their newly purchased juice bar, but Chase can't take the job seriously. Back at the house, Faye tries to collect on a bet she made with Grayson.

9.title: Chase in Charge
9.plot: Todd and Julie head to LA for Julie's liposuction procedure leaving Chase in charge. But when Chase abuses his newfound authority, Todd must return home early to put a stop to Chases' antics.

10.title: Family Matters
10.plot: When Todd takes the juice bar employees on a teambuilding excursion Savannah and Chase get into a disagreement. And when Faye has a health scare, the Chrisley's are forced to come together.

11.title: Goat Farm Yourself
11.plot: Todd sends Chase and Savannah to the Nobles goat farm to learn the value of hard work.

12.title: Todd Goes Country
12.plot: Todd plans a special song for Julie's birthday; Todd tricks Julie into thinking the party is for him; Todd then has to rely on Savannah for help.

13.title: Hawaii Love You So
13.plot: Todd brings the Chrisley Family along his and Julie's anniversary to Hawaii; Lindsie and Savannah must keep an eye on Nanny Faye.

14.title: Don't Kale Yourself
14.plot: Linsdie challenges Todd and Julie to quit their unhealthy eating habits; Chase gets his wisdom teeth removed.

15.title: Todd's Not Dead
15.plot: Todd faces his fears by making his family plan his own funeral; Savannah must work in a dog shelter due to her pageant queen duties.

16.title: Colon All Cards
16.plot: Todd sets an appointment for Julie's colonoscopy but runs into trouble when she forces him to get one too. Faye's gambling gets out of hand and Lindsie takes drastic measures to get her to quit.

17.title: You Can't Handle the Truce
17.plot: After two years without talking, Julie and Lindsie say it's time for Todd to make amends with his son-in-law Will. Grayson turns to Savannah for dating advice when he has his first crush.

18.title: Review and Renew
18.plot: Todd and the kids film a commercial to promote the Juice Bar, but problems arise when Todd makes himself director. Julie and BFF Lea look into getting a vaginal rejuvenation procedure done.

19.title: Go Flip Yourself
19.plot: Todd is forced to the rescue when Chase and Parker take on an house-flipping project. When Todd's childhood friend and prankster-in-crime Bill comes to visit, Julie seeks solace with Savannah.

20.title: Message in a Bottle Rocket
20.plot: Todd takes the family to a rustic resort for the Fourth of July, but becomes upset when his outdoor skills are mocked; Chase and Parker become the course of major fireworks.

21.title: Crowning Around
21.plot: The family travels to Las Vegas to support Savannah in the Miss Teen USA Beauty Pageant; Chase keeps tabs on a gambler.

22.title: Pretty in Print
22.plot: Todd and Savannah are both chosen to be part of a "Beautiful People of Nashville" issue; Julie helps Chase prepare for an exam.

23.title: Truth or Chair
23.plot: When Todd moves his mother to Nashville, her possessions take over his home; Chase forces Todd to take a lie detector test.

24.title: Rent Controlled
24.plot: Savannah decides to buy a home but when Todd offers to help out; she realizes there are too many strings attached. Grayson monthly phone bill gets him in hot water with Todd.

25.title: The House That Todd Built
25.plot: Determined to teach his children to give back to the community, Todd signs the family up with a local charity. Grayson's school project leads to a rift between Todd and Faye over their heritage.

26.title: A Very Grisly Chrisley
26.plot: The Chrisleys enter a Halloween decorating contest, but when Todd gets too competitive, Julie loses her patience. Lindsie opens up to the family about her relationship with Will.

1.title: 50 Shades of Faye
1.plot: Nanny Faye joins the world of online dating. When Todd gets wind of it, however, he makes himself her chaperone. Meanwhile, new homeowners Chase and Savannah compete for Todd's handouts to furnish their homes.

2.title: Client-Hell
2.plot: Savannah agrees to manage Todd's singing career for a school project and unwittingly unleashes his inner diva; and Chase struggles to throw a dinner for the family to prove he can outdo Savannah.

3.title: Bunions, Bulldogs and Hedgehogs, Oh My!
3.plot: Todd thinks taking over Julie's housework while she recovers from surgery will be a cakewalk, but running the home isn't as easy as it looks. And Chase schemes with Nanny Faye to get Todd to accept his dog, Lilo.

4.title: Market Crash
4.plot: Chase accepts Todd's challenge to market the juice bar, but quickly realizes that selling juice is hard. Meanwhile, Todd and Julie fret about Savannah, who's convalescing at the family home after a bad car wreck.

5.title: Mannequin Challenge
5.plot: It's all hands on deck when Savannah struggles with a project for her clothing line; and, after receiving an ultimatum from Todd, Chase will try anything to get Lilo's behavior under control.

6.title: O Grayson, Where Art Thou?
6.plot: Todd and Julie's hope for a relaxing weekend together proves to be wishful thinking; and when Chase has Grayson over for some brotherly bonding, the bonding goes out the window.

7.title: Matchmakers and Batchbakers
7.plot: After a recent break up Savannah decides she's ready to date again and Todd and Julie compete to find her perfect match. In other events, Grayson enters a creative cookie contest.

8.title: Dancing Tween
8.plot: Todd and Julie find themselves at odds about Grayson growing up when he's invited to his first tween dance. Meanwhile, Savannah's fancy new ride causes Todd to put her and Nanny Faye's driving skills to the test.

9.title: Moms Just Wanna Have Fun
9.plot: When Todd refuses to celebrate anyone but Faye for Mother's Day, Julie and Lindsie decide to make their own plans. Meanwhile, Todd is forced to babysit Jackson but struggles with Lindsie's new age parenting techniques.

10.title: Twisted Sisters
10.plot: When Todd offers to be a chauffeur for Faye and her sister Francis, he gets more than he bargained for. Meanwhile, Julie opens a boutique real estate office, but things go awry when she offers to sell Savannah's house.

11.title: Prank Master
11.plot: When Savannah decides to drop out of college Todd hatches a plan to get her back in class. Meanwhile Nanny Faye works overtime to pull an epic prank on Todd.

12.title: Remission Control
12.plot: The Chrisley's take it to the gutter with a family bowling tournament. And while Julie waits to hear if her cancer is in remission, the family plans a surprise for her.

13.title: Animal House
13.plot: Todd gets more than he bargained for when he offers to watch a house full of children. And Julie struggles to let her hair down on a girls' weekend.

14.title: Differing Strokes
14.plot: Todd and Chase team up for a not so friendly golf match against Jay Demarcus. And Savannah attempts to move in with Nanny Faye only to discover there's no room at the inn!

15.title: Runaways & Segways
15.plot: Todd and Savannah butt heads while planning a fashion show for charity. Meanwhile, Chase helps Nanny Faye apply for a job as a Segway tour guide to win a bet with Todd.

16.title: Boys to Men
16.plot: Todd highjacks Chase's 21st birthday plans and forces some father/son bonding time on him. Meanwhile, Julie tries to get Grayson ready for football tryouts but knows nothing about football.

17.title: Quit Your Pitchin'
17.plot: Todd attempts to train Savannah for a charity softball game despite not knowing how to play himself. And when Todd neglects to help Grayson train his new puppy he gets on Julie's bad side.

18.title: Truckin' Good Time
18.plot: Julie bites off more than she can chew when she agrees to make desserts for a food truck event. Meanwhile, Grayson gets a lesson from Todd about what it means to be truly sorry.

19.title: Pitch Perfect
19.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

20.title: Tantrums and Tiaras
20.plot: Grayson's dream to visit Universal Orlando's Volcano Bay is in jeopardy when his parents' work gets in the way.

21.title: Bringing Up Baby
21.plot: Chase and Savannah get more than they bargain for when they give Todd and Julie the weekend off parental duties. With their free time, Todd and Julie rekindle their romance.

22.title: Granny's Gone Wild
22.plot: When Todd upsets Faye she threatens to move back to Atlanta. Meanwhile, Julie struggles to get Grayson ready to start his new school.

23.title: Ready to Launch
23.plot: The Chrisleys head to Tampa for Savannah's fashion line launch at HSN. Todd and Julie help Savannah overcome her on air jitters, and Nanny gets Chase in trouble at a casino.

24.title: Baking Bad
24.plot: Julie and Faye battle over who will host the Chrisley family Thanksgiving dinner. Meanwhile, Todd struggles to find a cure for his insomnia.

25.title: A Play in a Manger
25.plot: Todd & Julie direct the community nativity play while also trying to teach Chloe and Grayson the true meaning of Christmas.

26.title: The Nightmare Before Chrisley
26.plot: Overwhelmed with all the guests visiting for the weekend, Todd has difficulty getting into the Christmas spirit.

imdb.title: Chrisley Knows Best
plot: Follows Atlanta-based self-made multimillionaire Todd Chrisley, his devoted wife Julie and their five children who live a seemingly picture-perfect Southern life with everything money can buy.::USA Network
